title: Spice and Wolf : Holo 1/8 Scale PVC Figure By Good Smile Company GSC
features: (C) Furukura Frozen / ASCII Media Works / "Wolf and Spice" Production Committee
description: From the "Wolf and Spice," Holo The Wise Wolf becomes a 1/8 scale figure! Height: about 200mm. PVC painted finished figure. Good Smile Company, Inc. established in May 2001, is a Japanese manufacturer of figures, toys and accessories. The planning, sculpting and production are each checked constantly to ensure the final product lives up to the Good Smile Company name. The Nendoroid is a smash hit series figure since its creation in 2006. In recent years, the Good Smile Company has also started expanding into the overseas market, as well as teaming up with foreign artists to release collaboration products. Business Activities: [1.Planning, development, production and sale of toys and figures.] [2.Advertising, sales consulting and business outsourcing for toys and figures.] [3.Package design, advertisement design and web design subcontractors for toys and figures.] [4.Planning and production of video and music.][5.Running of showrooms and cafes.]
